/usr/bin/c++    -lGL  -lGLU  -lglut -lGLEW  -std=c++14 -g  -pthread   -L /lib64  -O3 -DNDEBUG  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/mpm_3d.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mpm_3d.dir/scrInteractor.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mpm_3d.dir/TrackBall.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mpm_3d.dir/polarDecomposition.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mpm_3d.dir/mat3d.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mpm_3d.dir/eig3.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mpm_3d.dir/vec3d.cpp.o  -o mpm_3d -lGL -lGLU -lglut -lXmu -lXi -lpthread
